name: 系统维护管理查询模板字典
description: 系统日志、备份记录、维护任务、性能监控、错误跟踪、系统健康检查、数据清理、系统更新等系统维护管理相关表的查询模板

系统日志总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs

日志级别统计.sql: SELECT log_level, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs GROUP BY log_level ORDER BY FIELD(log_level, 'CRITICAL', 'ERROR', 'WARNING', 'INFO', 'DEBUG')

错误日志统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs WHERE log_level IN ('ERROR', 'CRITICAL')

本月系统日志.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月系统日志.description: 查询本月系统日志数量

备份记录总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM backup_records

备份状态统计.sql: SELECT backup_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM backup_records GROUP BY backup_status ORDER BY count DESC

成功备份统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM backup_records WHERE backup_status = 'success'

备份类型统计.sql: SELECT backup_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM backup_records GROUP BY backup_type ORDER BY count DESC

维护任务总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM maintenance_tasks

任务状态统计.sql: SELECT task_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM maintenance_tasks GROUP BY task_status ORDER BY count DESC
任务状态统计.description: 统计维护任务状态分布
任务状态统计.response: 维护任务状态统计完成

任务类型统计.sql: SELECT task_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM maintenance_tasks GROUP BY task_type ORDER BY count DESC
任务类型统计.description: 统计维护任务类型分布
任务类型统计.response: 维护任务类型统计完成

待执行任务.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_status = 'pending'
待执行任务.description: 查询待执行维护任务数量

性能监控记录总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM performance_monitors
性能监控记录总数.description: 查询性能监控记录总数
性能监控记录总数.response: 性能监控记录总数为{count}条

性能指标统计.sql: SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) as avg_value, MIN(metric_value) as min_value, MAX(metric_value) as max_value FROM performance_monitors GROUP BY metric_name ORDER BY avg_value DESC

性能告警统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM performance_monitors WHERE alert_triggered = 1

错误跟踪记录总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM error_tracking
错误跟踪记录总数.description: 查询错误跟踪记录总数
错误跟踪记录总数.response: 错误跟踪记录总数为{count}条

错误类型统计.sql: SELECT error_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM error_tracking GROUP BY error_type ORDER BY count DESC

错误严重程度统计.sql: SELECT severity_level, COUNT(*) as count FROM error_tracking GROUP BY severity_level ORDER BY FIELD(severity_level, 'CRITICAL', 'HIGH', 'MEDIUM', 'LOW')
错误严重程度统计.description: 统计错误严重程度分布
错误严重程度统计.response: 错误严重程度统计完成

未解决错误.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM error_tracking WHERE resolution_status = 'unresolved'

健康检查记录总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_health_checks
健康检查记录总数.description: 查询系统健康检查记录总数
健康检查记录总数.response: 系统健康检查记录总数为{count}条

健康状态统计.sql: SELECT health_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_health_checks GROUP BY health_status ORDER BY count DESC
健康状态统计.description: 统计系统健康状态分布
健康状态统计.response: 系统健康状态统计完成

检查项目统计.sql: SELECT check_item, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_health_checks GROUP BY check_item ORDER BY count DESC
检查项目统计.description: 统计健康检查项目分布
检查项目统计.response: 健康检查项目统计完成

健康检查通过率.sql: SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN health_status = 'healthy' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) as pass_rate FROM system_health_checks
健康检查通过率.response: 健康检查通过率分析完成

数据清理记录总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM data_cleanup_logs
数据清理记录总数.description: 查询数据清理记录总数
数据清理记录总数.response: 数据清理记录总数为{count}条

清理任务状态统计.sql: SELECT cleanup_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM data_cleanup_logs GROUP BY cleanup_status ORDER BY count DESC
清理任务状态统计.description: 统计数据清理任务状态分布
清理任务状态统计.response: 数据清理任务状态统计完成

清理数据量统计.sql: SELECT SUM(records_cleaned) as total_cleaned, AVG(records_cleaned) as avg_cleaned FROM data_cleanup_logs WHERE cleanup_status = 'completed'

系统更新记录总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_updates
系统更新记录总数.description: 查询系统更新记录总数
系统更新记录总数.response: 系统更新记录总数为{count}个

更新状态统计.sql: SELECT update_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_updates GROUP BY update_status ORDER BY count DESC
更新状态统计.description: 统计系统更新状态分布
更新状态统计.response: 系统更新状态统计完成

更新类型统计.sql: SELECT update_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_updates GROUP BY update_type ORDER BY count DESC
更新类型统计.description: 统计系统更新类型分布
更新类型统计.response: 系统更新类型统计完成

成功更新统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_updates WHERE update_status = 'success'

系统维护概览.sql: SELECT 'system_logs' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs UNION ALL SELECT 'backup_records' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM backup_records UNION ALL SELECT 'maintenance_tasks' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM maintenance_tasks UNION ALL SELECT 'performance_monitors' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM performance_monitors UNION ALL SELECT 'error_tracking' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM error_tracking UNION ALL SELECT 'system_health_checks' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_health_checks UNION ALL SELECT 'data_cleanup_logs' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM data_cleanup_logs UNION ALL SELECT 'system_updates' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_updates
系统维护概览.description: 系统维护管理数据总览
系统维护概览.response: 系统维护概览查询完成
